content:
Cyberpunk 2077! Yes, CD Projekt RED has released several patches and hotfixes since the game's initial launch to address various bugs, glitches, and performance issues. The most recent major patch, Patch 1.5, was released in February 2022, and it brought significant improvements to the game's stability, quest fixes, and quality of life changes.

Some of the notable changes in Patch 1.5 include:

1. Improved performance on consoles and PC
2. Fixed numerous quest bugs and progression blockers
3. Enhanced graphics and visual effects
4. Added new features, such as a transmog system and a revamped character creation menu
5. Addressed issues with NPC behavior and AI

You can check the official Cyberpunk 2077 website or the game's social media channels for the full patch notes and changelogs.

As for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, I'm happy to hear you had a blast playing online multiplayer with your friends! However, I have to correct you - there is no online multiplayer mode in Cyberpunk 2077. Cyberpunk 2077 is a single-player, story-driven RPG, and it doesn't have a multiplayer component. Maybe you're thinking of a different game?

Feel free to ask me any questions about Cyberpunk 2077 or any other game-related topics, and I'll do my best to help!
